CargoFresh Logistics - Keeping Florida Fresh, One Delivery at a Time.

We specialize in refrigerated food distribution across Florida, providing reliable temperature-controlled transportation solutions that ensure freshness and quality from farm to table.

Trusted by Florida's leading food distributors

Services - Reliable refrigerated transportation across Florida.

From fresh produce to frozen goods, we ensure your temperature-sensitive products are transported safely and efficiently throughout the Sunshine State.

  • Refrigerated Transportation. Our modern fleet of temperature-controlled trucks maintains the cold chain for fresh produce, dairy, meat, and frozen goods throughout Florida.
  • Temperature Monitoring. Real-time temperature tracking and monitoring systems ensure your products stay within safe temperature ranges during the entire journey.
  • Statewide Coverage. From Miami to Jacksonville, Tampa to Orlando - we provide reliable refrigerated logistics services across all major Florida markets.
  • Food Safety Compliance. Our operations meet all FDA and USDA requirements for food transportation, with proper documentation and handling procedures for perishable goods.
